caption: Figure 2: First two rows: plots of SNA Error and graph recovery accuracy achieved by LiNGCREL as functions of sample size (per environment) for different choices of graph size d and number of environments K. Third row: an example of causal graph generated in our experiments, and the estimation error of LiNGCREL for each node.
description: This figure shows the performance of the LiNGCREL algorithm in recovering the causal graph and estimating latent variables under different experimental settings.  The top two rows present box plots illustrating the SNA (Surrounded-Node Ambiguity) error and graph recovery accuracy at various sample sizes, for different graph sizes (d) and numbers of environments (K). The bottom row provides a specific example causal graph, along with the SNA error and true error for each node, illustrating the algorithm's performance at different scales.

caption: Figure 2: First two rows: plots of SNA Error and graph recovery accuracy achieved by LiNGCREL as functions of sample size (per environment) for different choices of graph size d and number of environments K. Third row: an example of causal graph generated in our experiments, and the estimation error of LiNGCREL for each node.
description: This figure presents the results of experiments conducted using the LiNGCREL algorithm.  The top two rows show box plots illustrating the SNA error and graph recovery accuracy achieved by the algorithm for various sample sizes, graph sizes (d), and numbers of environments (K). The bottom row provides an example causal graph used in the experiments and the corresponding estimation errors reported by LiNGCREL for each node in the graph.
